title: HCL Tech Q4 Results: Net profit zooms 226% to Rs 3,593 crore - Economic Times
content:
1. HCL Tech Q4 Results: Net profit zooms 226% to Rs 3,593 crore  Economic Times
  2. Hcl Tech Reports Net Profit Of â‚¹3,593 Cr In Q4, Announces Dividend  Mint
  3. HCL Tech Q4 Results: Net Profit Jumps 226% To Rs 3,593 Crore; Revenue Up 15.1%  News18
  4. HCL Tech Q4 Result | Profit more than triples to Rs 3,593 cr, revenue up at Rs 22,597 cr  Moneycontrol

description: ET Now poll of analysts had projected net profits at Rs 3,350 crore. The profit jump is due to much higher tax expenses in the base quarter. The adjusted growth in profit is 23.9 per cent year on year (YoY), the company said.
